attributes.review: I am a Trump supporter but all these reviews are right. The second this app finally downloaded (which mind you, took all day) it made my phone incredibly glitchy and it started to heat up fast. I couldn’t even open the app and I could barely get into my phone! I couldn’t text, call, or use any other apps or see where my kids were on life 360! I was forced to delete the app.....
attributes.title: Incredibly disappointing

attributes.review: When i tried to download it a link came up and said that i’m invited to trumps rally so i clicked then it took me to this link and told me to sign up so i did i put my credit card in and signed up now i have no money in my bank and i am homeless i am using a friends phone right now and i have no money to get a lawyer i have come down to eating my own poopy to survive this app should be taken off the app store periodt🕺
attributes.title: Worst app ever😾

attributes.review: I downloaded it to find more reasons to vote for trump, and this made my phone glitch really bad(and I just bought my phone it’s an iPhone 11 if you may know)so I uninstalled it and my phone was so much better. I thought I would also say within the 10 minutes I had this app I had extremely bad luck, I got a call from my aunt saying my grandma died of a hart attack. And I didn’t get any ketchup with my fries at McDonald’s. DON’T DOWNLOAD
attributes.title: ⚠️⚠️⚠️DON’T DOWNLOAD⚠️⚠️⚠️

attributes.review: the second i downloaded this app my fishbowl broke and my fish died from suffocating. then my mom called me and said she’s giving away my room to my great aunt who’s apparently moving in tomorrow. the app then crashed my phone making me miss the call that said i was accepted to play noah schnapps girlfriend on season 4 of stranger things. long story short, this app RUINED MY LIFE!! now i don’t have a room, my fish is dead, and i’m as single as can be. I HATE THE TRUMP 2020 APP!!!👎👎👎👎👎👎
attributes.title: worst app EVER😡💩

attributes.review: So I downloaded this app to “SuPpOrT oUr PrEsIdEnT” but it seems that it glitched my phone to much and all I could see was an orange I also believe it made my phone throw it back and it is just a horrible app all together it asked for personal information so I gave it but now I just receive many many calls in the middle of the night saying support trump support trump so I believe this app is a horrible app and you shouldn’t download it
attributes.title: Orange 🍊

attributes.review:
There was a scary orange blob fish all over the app!!😰 It scared me, my little sister and poor little dog 😔✋ The app told me to go back to my country for some reason... I saw things that scarred me for life and I could never look back 
😭 This app will haunt my nightmares for the rest of my life😖 I will tell my grandchildren my story of how I survived a heart attack from this fugly app😽 anyways I don’t know why this app was made but ummm take. IT. DOOOOWN. Right now. Please and thank you🧚🏾‍♀️✨
attributes.title: Scary orange blob fish

attributes.review:
I downloaded this app to gain a better idea about my current president, i thought it would help but I’m afraid it did not 😔 Instead i was met with an incapable app that just took up space on my phone, i have a few recommendations on how to improve the app here is my list, 
1. Delete the app 
Okay those are my recommendations, i hope the trump administration finds this review helpful and i hope you all have a blessed day 😊
attributes.title: Not the greatest

attributes.review: This app is awful, it’s so slow and has so many adds. I would rate it negative stars if I could. I suggest never downloading this to your phone once I downloaded it a month ago my phone has been running extremely slow and it has never been the same since. DO NOT DOWNLOAD! And if you do and you agree with me please leave another review telling your horrible experience so we can spread awareness.
attributes.title: Terrible.
